title: Browser compatibility
description: Test if your browser supports File API needed for bulk response downloads.
step2: Allow "This site to view and copy files"
clickToSelect: Click to select a directory for testing. You will be prompted to grant permissions.
fileSystemReadAskForUrls: File System Read Ask For URLs
fileSystemReadAskForUrlsDescription: Allow GC Forms to ask for read access to files.
fileSystemWriteAskForUrls: File System Write Ask For URLs
fileSystemWriteAskForUrlsDescription: Allow GC Forms to ask for write access to files.
mdnWebDocsDescription: Comprehensive documentation on the File System API
webDevGuideDescription: Google's guide with practical examples and best practices
